<style>
   #decision-tree {
      font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
      max-width: 600px;
      margin: 0 auto;
      padding: 20px;
      border: 1px solid #ccc;
      border-radius: 8px;
      background-color: #f9f9f9;
   }

   #question {
      margin-bottom: 20px;
      font-size: 1.2em;
      color: #333;
   }

   .option-button {
      display: block;
      width: 100%;
      padding: 10px;
      margin: 5px 0;
      font-size: 1em;
      color: #fff;
      background-color: #007bff;
      border: none;
      border-radius: 4px;
      cursor: pointer;
   }

   .option-button:hover {
      background-color: #0056b3;
   }

   #back-button, #reset-button {
      margin-top: 10px;
      padding: 8px 16px;
      font-size: 0.9em;
      color: #fff;
      background-color: #6c757d;
      border: none;
      border-radius: 4px;
      cursor: pointer;
   }

   #back-button:hover, #reset-button:hover {
      background-color: #5a6268;
   }
</style>

<div id="decision-tree">
  <h2 id="question"></h2>
  <div id="options"></div>
  <button id="back-button" style="display: none;">Back</button>
  <button id="reset-button">Reset</button>
</div>



<script type="module" src="./script/tree.js"></script>
